process.name: Exporting Assets
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="6">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="New Task" pm:screenRef="4" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="5">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_4" name="New Script Task" pm:scriptRef="1">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:manualTask id="node_6" name="New Manual Task" pm:screenRef="10" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="5">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:manualTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" name="start" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="next" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="next" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_6"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_10" name="End Event" pm:screenRef="7">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="end" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_10"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="190" y="310" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="570" y="290" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="340" y="290" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="810" y="290" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="208" y="328"/>
        <di:waypoint x="398" y="328"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="398" y="328"/>
        <di:waypoint x="628" y="328"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="628" y="328"/>
        <di:waypoint x="868" y="328"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <dc:Bounds x="1050" y="310" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="868" y="328"/>
        <di:waypoint x="1068" y="328"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
